Car                                     Price
                                                                               
s                                       $50000

You need to play with font-family, font-size and maybe line-height as described
here: http://xmlgraphics.apache.org/fop/0.20.5/output.html#txt

BTW, the "font" property is not implemented in FOP 0.20.5!

On your document font-family="Courier" font-size="10pt", no line-height property
worked fine.

A polite request: Please send questions to the fop-users mailing list next time.
Thanks! http://xmlgraphics.apache.org/fop/maillist.html#fop-user
